channel.title: VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics
channel.description: Recent content in VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics

item.title: Learning English Podcast - December 19, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, what does the trial of an activist publisher on national security charges mean for Hong Kong’s future? ; research suggests millions of Americans suffer long-term tiredness followed by a discussion about the problem; then ‘sneaking around’ on Lesson of the Day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - December 18, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, a short history of climate-related promises made at U.N. climate meetings; scientists have connected nerve cells with an electric circuit to make a biocomputer followed by a discussion about the system’s biological part and its accuracy; then present perfect on Lesson of the Day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - December 17, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, top college presidents face criticism over testimony about antisematism; expression that include the word ‘snowball’ followed by a discussion about what happens when something snowballs; then the presidency of Bill Clinton on America’s Presidents. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - December 16, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, a Brazilian indian tribe aims to expand by having female chiefs as it nears disappearing; we answer a listener’s question about ‘wonder’ followed by a discussion about pronouncing wonder and wander; then “The Gift of the Magi” by O. Henry on American Stories. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - December 15, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description Learning English use a limited vocabulary and are read at a slower pace than VOA’s other English broadcasts. Previously known as Special English. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - December 14, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation aims to donate $100 million; the most mispronounced words of the year; a jury finds Google’s app store illegally blocks competition followed by a discussion on monopolies; then pronunciation and idioms on Lesson of the Day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - December 13, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, environmentalists in Michigan learn to live with a nickel mine; hundreds of seals die from bird flu in Brazil; an international test shows math scores have decreased since 2018 followed by a discussion about resilience in education; on Lesson of the Day, ‘supply chain.' Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - December 12, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description Pangea: On today’s podcast, Japanese baseball player Shohei Ohtani gets the biggest-ever contract in team sports; the U.S. government approves to gene treatments for sickle cell disease followed by an explanation about the disease; then lend and borrow on Lesson of the Day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - December 11, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, the College Board changes AP Black history classes after questions; ancient male mosquitos were different; scientists discover an unusual planetary system followed by a discussion on the six, newly-found ‘harmonious’ planets; then the future continuous on Lesson of the Day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - December 10, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, more small colleges are closing down because of high costs and other reasons; publishers name ‘AI,’ ‘hallucinate,’ ‘authentic’ and ‘rizz’ as words of the year; then, the presidency of George H.W. Bush on America’s Presidents. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - December 09, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, India plans a huge renewable energy project; a rock band aims to perform ‘forever’ using computer avatars; a listener’s question about the difference between ‘ability’ and ‘capability’; followed by a Edith Warton’s piece: ‘The Line of Least Resistance’ on American Stories. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - December 08, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, all about the Jewish holiday of Hanukkah; the U.S. government aims to reduce uranium production for nuclear submarines; development of artificial intelligence divides the technology industry; talking about pets followed by a discussion about our animal friends. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - December 07, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description Learning English use a limited vocabulary and are read at a slower pace than VOA’s other English broadcasts. Previously known as Special English. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - December 06, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, a study finds penguins use microsleep to get enough rest; the Associated Press says many home schools in Louisiana operate outside the state education system followed by a discussion about the findings; then, the word ‘legacy’ on Lesson of the Day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - December 05, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, efforts grow in the U.S. to reduce food waste; South Africa, Colombia push drug makers to permit cheap TB, HIV/AIDS drugs followed by a discussion about what patents are; then learn what “plan B” is on Lesson of the Day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - December 04, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description Learning English uses a limited vocabulary and are read at a slower pace than VOA’s other English broadcasts. Previously known as Special English. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - December 03, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, what foreign college students do when big American holidays come along; bright expressions shine a light on things; followed by the presidency of Ronald Reagan on America’s Presidents. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - December 02, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, life expectancy is rising in the U.S. after years of decline; a new book about Dr. Seuss’s Grinch called ‘How the Grinch Lost Christmas’; we answer a listener’s question about the difference between ‘price’ and ‘rate’; ‘The Boarded Window’ by Ambrose Bierce on American Stories. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - December 01, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, statesman Henry Kissinger dies at 100; Young Chinese seek a freer life in the country’s southwest; South Korea uses matchmaking to lift birth rate; then, the grammar of gift giving followed by a discussion about hopes for holiday gifts. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 30, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, a former Somali refugee wins UN refuge agency prize; passenger jet flies the Atlantic Ocean on fuel made from cooking fat; Google plans to remove unused accounts followed by a details about Google’s plan; then how feedback works on Lesson of the Day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 29, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, India road workers rescued from a collapsed tunnel after 17 days; costly water is growing in popularity; a program in Washington, D.C.’s poorest neighborhoods sends journalism students to college followed by more on D.C. neighborhoods; then, ‘cultivation’ on Lesson of the Day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 28, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, the latest on the hostage release during a cease-fire in the Hamas-Israel war; Christmas at the White House; new research into an Alzheimer’s disease vaccine followed by a discussion on the report; then, resolutions and fun public speaking tips on Lesson of the Day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 27, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, sugar is in short supply in many nations after a poor harvest; NASA is using lasers to send more information from spacecraft followed by a discussion the new technology and a space mission to an asteroid; then prefixes and shortened forms on Lesson of the Day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 26, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, the U.S. Department of Education says Black and Latino students lack the tools for success; a clergyman uses music to connect with young people; ‘count your blessing’ and other expressions followed by the presidency of Jimmy Carter on America’s Presidents. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 25, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, the World Health Organization says nothing unusual about wave of lung infections in northeastern China; herders continue to keep animals in a change world; a listener’s question about ‘danger’ and ‘hazard’; then, ‘Two Thanksgiving Day Gentlemen’ by O. Henry. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 24, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, automakers aim to design electric cars with fewer rare earth metals; coral reefs in the Gulf of Mexico are doing well; the grammar of talking about pets followed by a discussion on those family friends; then famous women placed in the National Women’s Hall of Fame. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 23, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, U.S. companies aim to increase battery production; learn about the Thanksgiving Holiday in America followed by a discussion about the tradition; then hair problems on Lesson of the Day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 22, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, a “poor” man leaves a New Hampshire town $3.8 million; how did the turkey get its name?; a study finds schools’ reports on student grades do not mean the student is performing at grade level followed by a discussion about report cards; and the word ‘adopt’ on Lesson of the Day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 21, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, Argentina’s new president faces high inflation, economic problems; is it the end of China’s panda diplomacy?; experts worry not enough overweight people are included in drug tests; then ways to agree and disagree on Lesson of the Day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 20, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, extremist groups spread in West Africa; new research on Eris, a distant member of the solar system; Chinese researchers say the made an AI robot that makes oxygen from rocks, and a discussion on similar systems for Mars exploration; then possessive pronouns on Lesson of the Day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 19, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, numbers of foreign college students in the U.S. have returned to levels before COVID-19 thanks to Indian students; learn about ‘state-of-the-art’ and similar terms on Words and Their Stories; then, the presidency of Gerald Ford on America’s Presidents. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 18, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, could a movie about scams be keeping Chinese visitors away from Southeast Asia?; the difference between ‘source’ and ‘resource’ followed by a discussion on sources and plagiarism; then a ‘fountain of youth’ on Nathaniel Hawthorne’s ‘Doctor Heidegger’s Experiment.’ Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 17, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, how Taiwan is attending the APEC economic meetings in San Francisco; is a two-state agreement possible in the Middle East?; cheetahs might be changing hunting habits; Spain’s Canary Islands has too many immigrants; then, all about Happy Thanksgiving. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 16, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, people in Japan are buying fish from Fukushima as some countries ban products from that area; new companies aim to confirm video from social media followed by a discussion misinformation and artificial intelligence; then describing amounts in Lesson of the Day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 15, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, UN negotiators want a treaty on plastic pollution; in Japan, animals receive blessings; a report finds U.S. men graduate at lower rates than women followed by a discussion on the topic; then hear about the word ‘comply’ on Lesson of the Day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 14, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, hear about this week’s APEC meeting of Pacific Ocean leaders in San Francisco; the drug ketamine is being increasingly used to treat pain, depression and other conditions followed by a discussion on the drug’s effects; then reading people’s minds on Lesson of the Day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 13, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, evidence of a crash with another planet in Earth’s past; Syria’s dry conditions and climate change; a new space telescope begins its search for dark matter and energy followed by a discussion about forces at work in space; certainty and uncertainty on Lesson of the Day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 12, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, college students play climate change board games in class; expression for being in a good place followed by a discussion about ‘sitting pretty’’ and being on ‘cloud nine;’ then the presidency of Richard Nixon on America’s Presidents. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 11, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, a Swiss device helps a person with Parkinson’s disease; we answer a listener’s question about the word ‘get’ followed by a discussion about its common uses; then a Civil War veteran returns home in Hamlin Garland’s “Return of the Private” on American stories. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 10, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, an industrial robot crushes a South Korean worker; homes in Florida are being built to withstand strong storms; what do you do with autumn leaves?; how do we express pessimism in English followed by a discussion comparing pessimism and optimism. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 09, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, Kenya declares a surprise holiday to plant trees; should robots look like people?; scientists find a black hole that formed not long after the Big Bang followed by why you call a black hole “an object;” then listen nouns with –er endings on Lesson of the day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 08, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, people are again wearing masks in New Delhi, India; artist/activist makes an exhibit on the high cost of housing; then, lack of housing in Los Angeles has students missing class followed by a discussion about shaping a story; the word ‘interpret’ on Lesson of the Day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 07, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, group will rename all North America birds named after people; Colombia get serious about hippopotamus control; a new treatment for sickle cell disease followed by details about the dangerous disease; then interjections and a poem on Lesson of the Day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 06, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, Chinese migrants are crossing Panama to get to the U.S. southern border; Navajos in the American Southwest aim to keep sheep herding; Antarctica was once warm followed by a discussion about findings beneath Antarctica’s ice; then, going to a baseball game on Lesson of the Day. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 05, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, what happens when a foreign student mistakes Miami, Ohio, for Miami, Florida?; the popular expression ‘straight from the horse’s mouth’ on ‘Words and Their Stories;’ then, the presidency of Lyndon Johnson on ‘America’s Presidents.’ Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 04, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, a new university law class on – pop star Taylor Swift?; learn about Italian artist Michelangelo’s secret room; a listener’s question about using ‘which’ followed by a discussion on which preposition to use with ‘which;’ then, ‘The Boy on Graves-End Road’ on American Stories. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 03, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, what is Daylight Saving Time in the U.S.?; a U.N. report says budget cuts are hurting Rwanda; an environmental group says few companies are use water effectively; the grammar of optimism followed by a discussion on optimism and pessimism. Transcript

item.title: Learning English Podcast - November 02, 2023 | VOA Learning English Podcast - VOA Learning English
item.description: Podcast Description On today’s podcast, Vietnam aims to become a major computer chip manufacturer; a report says Africa is unlikely to increase manufacturing in the future; the way the world gets its electricity – grids – faces problems; then learn about ‘superlatives’ on Lesson of the Day. Transcript
